publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-794# Michael Russell: North Ayrshire Unemployment—That the Parliament notes with deep concern that in March 2000 North Ayrshire has the worst total unemployment rate of any local authority area in Scotland, including the worst unemployment rate for women and the second worst unemployment rate for men, deplores the huge waste of human potential which this represents in an area where people want to work and urges the Scottish Executive to address the grave economic problems which face North Ayrshire which include the imminent closure of the Volvo factory.
S1M-794# North Ayrshire Unemployment (lodged on 2 May 2000) Kay Ullrich*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-794# Michael Russell: North Ayrshire Unemployment—That the Parliament notes with deep concern that in March 2000 North Ayrshire has the worst total unemployment rate of any local authority area in Scotland, including the worst unemployment rate for women and the second worst unemployment rate for men, deplores the huge waste of human potential which this represents in an area where people want to work and urges the Scottish Executive to address the grave economic problems which face North Ayrshire which include the imminent closure of the Volvo factory. Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-794# North Ayrshire Unemployment (lodged on 2 May 2000) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-794# North Ayrshire Unemployment (lodged on 2 May 2000) Allan Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*

Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Allan Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Irene Oldfather*
